mapper.select: SELECT SUM(leadsCnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leadsUserCnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actualConsume) actualConsume, SUM(leadsCost) leadsCost, month month FROM ( SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, SUM(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_yiche_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} UNION SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, SUM(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_quote_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} UNION SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, SUM(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_pcwap_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} UNION SELECT SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, SUM(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_third_party_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} ) yiche_sum_month_report

SELECT platformName platformName, leadsCnt leadsCnt, leadsUserCnt leadsUserCnt, actualConsume actualConsume, leadsCost leadsCost, month month FROM ( SELECT platform_name platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, sum(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_yiche_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} UNION SELECT platform_name platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, sum(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_quote_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} UNION SELECT platform_name platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, sum(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_pcwap_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} UNION SELECT platform_name platformName, SUM(leads_cnt) leadsCnt, SUM(leads_user_cnt) leadsUserCnt, SUM(actual_consume) actualConsume, sum(leads_cost) leadsCost, month month FROM yiche_third_party_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} ) yiche_platformName_month_report WHERE platformName = #{platformName}

SELECT platformName, channelName, leadsCnt, leadsUserCnt, actualConsume, leadsCost, month, newUserCnt, newUserCost, systemId FROM ( SELECT platform_name platformName, channel_name channelName, leads_cnt leadsCnt, leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, actual_consume actualConsume, leads_cost leadsCost, month month, new_user_cnt newUserCnt, new_user_cost newUserCost, system_id systemId FROM yiche_yiche_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} AND system_id =#{systemId} UNION SELECT platform_name platformName, channel_name channelName, leads_cnt leadsCnt, leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, actual_consume actualConsume, leads_cost leadsCost, month month, new_user_cnt newUserCnt, new_user_cost newUserCost, system_id systemId FROM yiche_quote_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} AND system_id =#{systemId} ) yiche_quote_platform_month WHERE platformName=#{platformName}

SELECT platform_name platformName, channel_name channelName, leads_cnt leadsCnt, leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, actual_consume actualConsume, leads_cost leadsCost, month month, terminal_id terminalId, cooperation_day cooperationDay FROM yiche_pcwap_channel_month WHERE month = #{month} AND terminal_id =#{terminalId}

SELECT platform_name platformName, channel_name channelName, leads_cnt leadsCnt, leads_user_cnt leadsUserCnt, actual_consume actualConsume, leads_cost leadsCost, month month FROM smp.yiche_third_party_channel_month WHERE month=#{month}
